alert.note: Alert for Labette; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 1:52PM CST until January 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous wind chills as low as 25 below. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow is expected. Total snow accumulation around an inch. * WHERE...Portions of South Central and Southeast Kansas. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
